$comment: OSCAL System Security Plan (SSP) Format: JSON Schema

metadata.title: Publication metadata
metadata.description: Provides information about the publication and availability of the containing document.

back-matter.title: Back matter
back-matter.description: A collection of citations and resource references.

link.title: Link
link.description: A reference to a local or remote resource

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

rel.title: Relation
rel.description: Describes the type of relationship provided by the link. This can be an indicator of the link's purpose.

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

version.title: Document version
version.description: The version of the document content.

doc-id.title: Document Identifier
doc-id.description: A document identifier qualified by an identifier type.

type.description: Qualifies the kind of document identifier.

prop.title: Property
prop.description: A value with a name, attributed to the containing control, subcontrol, part, or group.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

party.title: Party (organization or person)
party.description: A responsible entity, either singular (an organization or person) or collective (multiple persons)

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

role-id.title: Role identifier
role-id.description: References a role element defined in metadata.

org.title: Organization
org.description: An organization or legal entity (not a person), with contact information

person-id.title: Personal Identifier
person-id.description: An identifier for a person (such as an ORCID) using a designated scheme.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

org-id.title: Organization Identifier
org-id.description: An identifier for an organization using a designated scheme.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

rlink.title: Related link
rlink.description: A pointer to an external copy of a document with optional hash for verification

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

short-name.title: short-name
short-name.description: A common name, short name or acronym

addr-line.title: Address line
addr-line.description: A single line of an address.

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for mailing address

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for mailing address

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address

type.description: Indicates the type of phone number.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL for web site or Internet presence

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: A resource associated with the present document.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

hash.title: Hash
hash.description: A representation of a cryptographic digest generated over a resource using a hash algorithm.

algorithm.title: Hash algorithm
algorithm.description: Method by which a hash is derived

role.title: Role
role.description: Defining a role to be assigned to a party or agent

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for display and navigation

filename.title: File Name
filename.description: Name of the file before it was encoded as Base64 to be embedded in a resource. This is the name that will be assigned to the file when the file is decoded.

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: A citation to resources, either external or internal (by means of internal cross-reference).

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

target.title: Citation target
target.description: An address for retrieval of a citation

note.title: Note
note.description: Permits multiple paragraphs, lists, tables etc.

party-id.title: Party Reference
party-id.description: References a party defined in metadata.

role-id.title: Role identifier
role-id.description: References a role element defined in metadata.

requirement-id.title: Requirement Identifier Reference
requirement-id.description: A reference to a requirement defined on another requirement set that should be included here.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

subcontrol-id.title: Subcontrol Identifier Reference
subcontrol-id.description: A reference to a subcontrol identifier.

using.title: Using
using.description: The set of implementations needed to support the control requirements.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: An implementation needed to support the control requirements.

configuration-id.title: Configuration Identifier Reference
configuration-id.description: A reference to a configuration defined on the component.

artifact-id.title: Artifact Identifier Reference
artifact-id.description: A reference to an artifact defined on the component.

statement-id.title: Statement Identifier
statement-id.description: Pointer to a speific requirement statement within a control or subcontrol.

with-argument.title: With Argument
with-argument.description: An argument to pass to the referenced configuration.

use-param.title: Using Parameter
use-param.description: An identified parameter from the catalog or profile who's value is assigned to the argument.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Information on how to configure the component (for technical types of components).

mechanism.title: mechanism
mechanism.description: Information on a mechanism used to configure the component.

id.title: Mechanism Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for the configuration mechanism.

configuration-method.title: Configuration Method
configuration-method.description: A mechanism used to deploy the configuration.

verification-method.title: Verification Method
verification-method.description: A mechanism used to verify a previously deployed configuration.

system.title: system
system.description: A configure or verify system type described by a well-known URI

type.title: Argument Data Type
type.description: The data type of the argument.

artifact.title: Configuration
artifact.description: Information on how to use the component (for documentary types of components).

href.title: Verification Process Resource Reference
href.description: Where to get the process to verify the artifact is implemented.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

import-profile.title: Import profile
import-profile.description: Used to import the OSCAL profile representing the system's control baseline.

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

system-characteristics.title: System Characteristics
system-characteristics.description: Contains the characteristics of the system, such as its name, purpose, and security impact level.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

system-information.title: System Information
system-information.description: Contains details about all types of information stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and NIST 800-60 information types.

designation.title: System Information Designation
designation.description: Used when a specific organization or compliance regiem requires certain information types to be explicitly cited, such as privacy impact information (PII), or payment card information (PCI).

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

declaration.title: Declaration
declaration.description: Identifies whether a specific designation applies to this system.

qualifiers.title: Information Designation Qualifiers
qualifiers.description: A list of questions about the system that contribute to the establishment of a designation, such as the FedRAMP privacy threshold analysis questions.

qualifier.title: Individual Information Designation Qualifier
qualifier.description: An individual questions about the system that contributes to the establishment of a designation, such as a FedRAMP privacy threshold analysis question.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

qual-question.title: Qualifier Question
qual-question.description: A question that must be answered about this system.

qual-notes.title: Qualifier Question Response Notes
qual-notes.description: Additional information about the response to the question.

information-type.title: Information Type
information-type.description: Contains details about one type of information stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and NIST 800-60 information types.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

nist-id.title: NIST 800-60 Information Type Identifier
nist-id.description: Pointer to the information type in NIST SP 800-60.

base.title: Base Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
base.description: The prescribed base (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

selected.title: Selected Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

adjustment-justification.title: Adjustment Justification
adjustment-justification.description: If the selected security level is different from the base security level, this contains the justificaiton for the change.

leveraged-authorization.title: Leveraged Authorization
leveraged-authorization.description: The details for a single leveraged authorization

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

leveraged-authorization-service-provider.title: Leveraged System Service Provider Name
leveraged-authorization-service-provider.description: Name of the service provider that manages the leveraged system.

leveraged-authorization-date-granted.title: Leveraged System Authorization Date
leveraged-authorization-date-granted.description: The date the leveraged system received its authorization.

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

system-role.title: Role
system-role.description: Defining a role to be assigned to a party or agent

role-id.title: Role identifier
role-id.description: References a role element defined in metadata.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

privilege.title: Privilege
privilege.description: Identifies the type/level of system privilege for the role. For FedRAMP, the only valid values are "p" (Privileged), "np" (Non-Privileged), or "nla" (No Logical Access).

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: Identifies the functions performed by the user role.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Provides a collection of statistics about users of the system.

system-implementation.title: System Implementation
system-implementation.description: Provides information as to how the system is implemented.

component.title: Component
component.description: A defined component that can be part of an implemented system.

component-type.title: Component Type
component-type.description: A category describing the purpose of the component.

capability.title: Capability
capability.description: A grouping of other components and/or capabilities.

service.title: Service
service.description: Information about an individual service within the system.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: Information about the protocol used to provide a service.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

start.title: Start
start.description: Indicates the starting port number in a port range.

end.title: End
end.description: Indicates the ending port number in a port range.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Describes the purpose for the service within the system.

used-by-component.title: Used By
used-by-component.description: Identifies a type of uses for the service. A component can be optionally identified.

component-id.title: Component Reference
component-id.description: A reference to a component by its identifier

interconnection.title: Interconnection
interconnection.description: Details on an individual system interconnection.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

isa-authorization.title: ISA Authorization
isa-authorization.description: Name of the individual who authorized the Interconnection Security Agreement (ISA).

isa-name.title: ISA Name
isa-name.description: Title of the Interconnection Security Agreement (ISA).

isa-date.title: ISA Date
isa-date.description: Date of the Interconnection Security Agreement (ISA).

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

ip-address.title: Internet Protocol Address
ip-address.description: Use the @type flag to deisgnate IPv4 or IPv6.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

component-id.title: Component Reference
component-id.description: A reference to a component by its identifier

virtual.title: Virtual
virtual.description: Designates an asset as either virtual (="yes") or physical (="no").

public.title: Public
public.description: Designates an asset as either publicly accessible (="yes") or not (="no").

dns-name.title: Network Name
dns-name.description: If available, state the DNS name or URL of the inventory item. This can be left blank if one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

netbios-name.title: NetBIOS Name
netbios-name.description: If available, state the NetBIOS name of the inventory item. This can be omitted if one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

mac-address.title: Media Access Control (MAC) Address
mac-address.description: If available, state the MAC Address of the inventory item. This can be left blank if one does not exist, or it is a dynamic field.

location.title: Location of the Asset
location.description: Physical location of hardware. Could include Data Center ID, Cage#, Rack# or other meaningful location identifiers.

asset-type.title: Asset Type
asset-type.description: Simple description of the asset's function (e.g., Router, Storage Array, DNS Server, etc.) Do not use vendor or product names here.

authenticated-scan.title: Authenticated Scan
authenticated-scan.description: Indicate whether this asset is planned for authenticated scanning.

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: Any additional information that could be useful to an auditor or reviewer.

serial-no.title: Serial Number
serial-no.description: Product serial number or internal asset tag number.

asset-owner.title: Asset Owner
asset-owner.description: The individual, title, or role who "owns" the asset on behalf of the organization.

party-id.title: Party Reference
party-id.description: References a party defined in metadata.

asset-administrator.title: Asset Administrator
asset-administrator.description: The individual, title, role, or team responsible for operating and maintaining the asset.

party-id.title: Party Reference
party-id.description: References a party defined in metadata.

control-implementation.title: Control Implementation
control-implementation.description: Defines how the system (as a whole) supports a set of controls.

by-component.title: Component Control Implementation
by-component.description: Defines how the referenced component implements a set of controls.

component-id.title: Component Reference
component-id.description: A reference to a component by its identifier

by-capability.title: capability Control Implementation
by-capability.description: Defines how the referenced capability implements a set of controls.

capability-id.title: Capability Reference
capability-id.description: A reference to a capability by its identifier

meets-requirement-set.title: Meets
meets-requirement-set.description: Defines what sets of controls are supported by the system (as a whole).

role-id.title: Role identifier
role-id.description: References a role element defined in metadata.

set-param.title: Set Parameter Value
set-param.description: Identifies the parameter that will be filled in by the enclosed value element.

param-id.title: Parameter ID
param-id.description: Points to a parameter within a control, to which the contained value will be assigned.

value.title: Value
value.description: The phrase or string that fills-in the parameter and completes the requirement statement.
